SEARCH
Package communications

Class ConnectionController

java.lang.Object
communications.ConnectionController
public class ConnectionController extends Object
The `ConnectionController` class is responsible for managing network connections with peers in a peer-to-peer network.
Author:
Miquel A. Fuster

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static final record 
    ConnectionController.ConnectionData
    This private record is used to represent a connection with another peer.

    Field
    Description
    private P2PCommListener
    commListener
    The listener that receives incoming messages and connection status notifications.

    A map of the last message ID received from each peer.

    A list of IP addresses to reconnect to if the connection is lost.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConnectionController

      public ConnectionController()

  • Method Details

    • addConnection

      void addConnection(Socket socket) throws IOException
      Adds a new connection with the specified socket to the list of connected peers.
      Parameters:
      socket - The socket to add the connection for.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while adding the connection.

    • closePeer

      void closePeer(String ip)
      Closes the connection with the peer at the specified IP address.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the peer to close the connection with.

    • connect

      private void connect(String ip) throws IOException
      Attempts to establish a connection with the peer at the specified IP address.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the peer to connect to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while attempting to connect.

    • controlPeerMessageId

      boolean controlPeerMessageId(String ip, long messageId)
      Checks whether a message with the specified ID has already been received from the peer at the specified IP address.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the peer to check the message ID for.
      messageId - The message ID to check.
      Returns:
      `true` if the message ID is new, `false` otherwise.

    • generateMessageFrame

      private Frame generateMessageFrame(String ip)
      Generates a new message frame to be sent to the peer at the specified IP address.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the peer to generate the message frame for.
      Returns:
      The new message frame.

    • getLocalIp

      private String getLocalIp()
      Returns the local IP address used for this connection.
      Returns:
      The local IP address.

    • getMessageId

      private long getMessageId()
      Returns a new message ID and increments the message counter.
      Returns:
      The new message ID.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the ConnectionController by starting the server thread and the reconnection thread.

    • killConnection

      void killConnection(String ip, boolean intentional)
      Closes the connection with the specified IP address.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the connection to close.
      intentional - True if the desconnection is planned. Fals if not.

    • pushMessage

      void pushMessage(String sourceIp, Object payload)
      Pushes a message received from a peer to the communication listener.
      Parameters:
      sourceIp - The IP address of the peer that sent the message.
      payload - The message payload.

    • resetPeerMessageId

      void resetPeerMessageId(String ip)
      Resets the message ID counter for the specified IP address.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address to reset the message ID counter for.

    • responsePing

      void responsePing(String peerIp)
      Sends a response to a ping message.
      Parameters:
      peerIp - The IP address of the peer that sent the ping.

    • send

      void send(Frame frame)
      Sends a message to the specified IP address.
      Parameters:
      frame - The message to send.

    • sendDisconnectionAdvise

      public void sendDisconnectionAdvise()
      Sends a disconnection advise to the peer. Creates a CloseFrame and sets its header with the message id, local IP and "*" as the remote IP. Then sends it.

    • sendFlood

      public void sendFlood(Object message)
      Sends a flood message to all connected peers. Generates a message frame with "*" as the remote IP, sets its payload to the given message and sends it.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send

    • sendMessage

      private void sendMessage(ConnectionController.ConnectionData connection, Frame frame) throws IOException
      Sends a message to a specific peer. Writes the given frame object to the ObjectOutputStream of the given connection.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection to send the message through
      frame - the frame to send
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error writing the frame to the ObjectOutputStream

    • sendPrivate

      public void sendPrivate(String ip, Object message)
      Sends a private message to a specific peer. Generates a message frame with the given IP as the remote IP, sets its payload to the given message and sends it.
      Parameters:
      ip - the IP address of the destination peer
      message - the message to send

    • setCommListener

      public void setCommListener(P2PCommListener commListener)
      Sets the P2P communication listener for this node and notifies it of all currently connected peers.
      Parameters:
      commListener - the listener to set

    • setLocalIp

      private void setLocalIp(String ip)
      Sets the local IP address used for this connection.
      Parameters:
      ip - The local IP address to set.
